articles.author: Matt Kew
articles.title: McLaren requires “urgent work” after F1 Belgian GP reality check - Motorsport.com
articles.description: McLaren requires “urgent work” to remedy weaknesses exposed by the “reality check” that was the 2023 Belgian Grand Prix, according to the Formula 1 team’s boss Andrea Stella.
articles.content: The team has gradually introduced a major upgrade package for its MCL60, but drivers and management have sought to play down expectations for recent races. Nevertheless, McLaren scored podiums at the… [+2657 chars]
